description: C-DAC Hyderabad invites online applications for various contract positions on Consolidate pay
Applications are invited (online only) for External Temporary Faculty for PG-Diploma courses at C-DAC Mumbai
Applications are invited (online only) for C-DAC Adjunct Engineer (CAE) scheme from motivated and experienced researchers for doing research in C-DAC interest areas
Applications are invited (online only) for Adjunct Scientist (ADS) scheme from motivated and experienced researchers for doing research in C-DAC
Cancellation of recruitment for the position of Executive Director (Level 14) notified vide Advertisement No. CORP/GR.A/03/2022
